name: Blondbarians Tower Adventure
description:
A small Puzzle Platformer game about a chubby barbarian named Saphi.

Saphi has entered the Wicked Tower in search for treasure! 

What dangers will he face?!

Controls:

Controller

  • D-Pad Left/D-Pad Right = Move
  • D-Pad Down = Crouch/Drop Block/Slide
  • X = Grab/Throw
  • A= Jump

Keyboard

  • LEFT/RIGHT = Move
  • DOWN = Crouch/Drop Block/Slide
  • A = Grab/Throw
  • S = Jump

Debug

R = Restart Current Level

Space = Restart Game
